titles.title: To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide for the expiration of emergency temporary standards after 6 months.
To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide for the expiration of emergency temporary standards after 6 months.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: This bill limits to six months the duration during which any emergency temporary standard published by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration may remain in effect.
